r.s: Renderer driver that generates a XML string
r.d: This is a Renderer driver for Structures_DataGrid that generates a XML string.
r.n:
Changes since Structures_DataGrid 0.6.3:
- Renderer driver unbundled from Structures_DataGrid core - new options 'useXMLDecl', 'outerTag' and 'rowTag' that allow customization of the output of this renderer
